description: Unique ID for each row, running integer

Comment

description: Period in which the material stream occured. Always relates to the year in which the period ends (i.e. year = 2020, reporting_period = July-June → Period is July 2019 to June 2020) If nothing is specified, it is January to December.

description: Period in which the material stream occured. Always relates to the year in which the period ends (i.e. year = 2020, reporting_period = July-June → Period is July 2019 to June 2020) If nothing is specified, it is January to December.
